title: Medical marijuana laws linked to health and labor supply benefits in older adults

title_detail.value: Medical marijuana laws linked to health and labor supply benefits in older adults

summary: A study that examined older Americans' well-being before and after medical marijuana laws were passed in their state found reductions in reported pain and increased hours worked. The study suggests medical marijuana laws could be improving older Americans' health.

summary_detail.value: A study that examined older Americans' well-being before and after medical marijuana laws were passed in their state found reductions in reported pain and increased hours worked. The study suggests medical marijuana laws could be improving older Americans' health.
